summary: HealSync is a full-stack doctor–patient platform that connects patients with verified doctors for both in-person and video consultations. The MVP focuses on appointment scheduling, real-time availability, secure telehealth video sessions, and commission-based monetization.

core_value_proposition.patients: Fast, transparent access to trusted healthcare professionals online or in person.
core_value_proposition.doctors: Zero-upfront, commission-based platform for acquiring and managing patients.
core_value_proposition.platform: Scalable and revenue-positive model using a per-booking commission system.

mvp_goals: Launch a working marketplace connecting patients and doctors.
Enable full appointment flow: search → booking → payment → consultation → review.
Validate monetization via commission on first-time patient bookings.

patients: Signup with email or phone verification
Search doctors by specialty, location, or consultation type
View doctor profiles with bio, pricing, and ratings
Book and pay instantly via secure payment gateway
Receive appointment reminders and submit post-visit feedback
doctors: Signup and verify credentials or licenses
Create and manage doctor profile with specialties, pricing, and consultation type
Access appointment dashboard for upcoming and past visits

monetization_model.doctors: Free to join; 10–15% commission on first booking with new patients.
monetization_model.patients: Free to browse; pay consultation fee upfront at booking.

tech_stack.ci_cd: GitHub Actions enforcing 100% coverage before deploy

deployment_and_devops.env_usage: All secrets stored in .env (Mongo URI, JWT secret, Stripe keys, etc.)
deployment_and_devops.ci_pipeline: Runs tests and deploys automatically when 100% coverage is achieved

long_term_vision: Subscription membership plans with discounted visits
Integrated pharmacy and lab test ordering
Secure messaging between doctors and patients

branching_strategy.feature/*: Feature-specific branches for modules like auth, booking, payments
